body:
subj.

From the current [example of the XML file](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/pull/2112#issuecomment-255980429), it looks like we don't log whether or not `--run-tests` were executed. I think it is a must-have information as there is a big difference between someone just installing things or at least also running some quick tests, if provided by a package.

In reference to https://github.com/LLNL/spack/issues/2014.

@tgamblin @alalazo : what do you think?
title: spack install --log-format=junit :  record if --run-tests was used
